job_title: Inside Sales Director - West Region - Bound Tree Medical
job_description:
Overview

The Inside Sales Director - West Region, is responsible for leading the company’s Regional Bound Tree Medical Inside sales teams including strategy and corresponding tactics implementation, year over year revenue growth, profitability, support, and talent development.

Sarnova is the leading national specialty distributor of health care products in Emergency Medical Services (EMS) and Respiratory Markets and is the industry leader in Revenue Cycle Management within Emergency Medical Services (EMS). The company operates through several market-leading companies including Bound Tree Medical, the largest supplier of EMS products, Tri-anim Health Services, the largest specialty distributor of respiratory products, Cardio Partners, a full Sudden Cardiac Arrest Solution provider, and Digitech, the leader in EMS revenue cycle management.

100% Remote Position: Candidates must currently be located in PST or MST

Responsibilities

Summary:

The Inside Sales Director - West Region, is responsible for leading the company’s Regional Bound Tree Medical Inside sales teams including strategy and corresponding tactics implementation, year over year revenue growth, profitability, support, and talent development. The Inside Sales Director is responsible for leading their team of Inside Sales Account Managers to call on Emergency Medical Service Units, Fire Departments, Police Departments, Ambulance Services, and other pre-hospital and health-related organizations/personnel. Will drive sales and growth strategies for the Inside Sales channel. Must be a strategic leader with a successful track record of leading B2B Inside Sales Team with a team oriented spirit with personal drive.

Organizational Impact:

At Sarnova, we appreciate innovative talent. What you do each day matters. In this position, your leadership skills will advocate for the Inside Sales team. You build healthy teams to support and influence our business goals and results. You profoundly influence the success of Bound Tree Medical by embracing an innovative and entrepreneurial mindset to drive success.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
• Lead with a Servant Leadership mentality.
• Lead execution of strategies and tactics that mobilize the Regional Bound Tree Medical Inside Sales team to achieve their annual sales and gross profit dollar quotas.
• Direct and administer established sales processes and metrics for increased productivity, profitable revenue growth, and customer satisfaction.
• Collaborate with the Area Vice President of Sales to develop Inside Sales quarterly and annual sales goals and objectives by product line.
• Monitor and communicate with Inside Sales Representatives and the leadership team regarding progress against Inside Sales objectives. Make appropriate and timely decisions to ensure performance is tracking to or exceeding plans.
• Collaborate with Area Vice President of Sales in administering the sales compensation plan and determining individual Inside Sales Representatives annual sales quotas/objectives.
• Coordinate initiatives and tactics with other internal departments, i.e., field sales, marketing, pricing, and contracts.
• Develop and sustain relationships with key customers and suppliers to stay abreast of current and emerging customer needs.
• Take an active role in developing direct reports through individual performance feedback, team meetings, stretch assignments, sales training, and national sales meetings.
• Excel in talent attraction, retention and development of the team.
• Empower self and others through effective, collaborative relationships that accomplish sales objectives and create an open and supportive work environment.
• Implement innovative ideas and enhancements for managing data anyalytics and increasing sales effectiveness.
• Leads a team of 10-15 associates.

Skills/Experience Required:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business or equivalent work experience.
• Minimum seven years’ sales experience with a proven track record of meeting/exceeding sales quotas.
• Minimum of 5 years’ experience leading Inside Sales Teams. B2B leadership experience preferred.
• Leading sales teams in the medical industry is preferred but not required.
• Possess an entrepreneurial spirit.
• Commitment to quality, integrity, attention to detail and ability to work collaboratively.
• Ability to build and sustain a cohesive sales team and facilitate sales quota attainment.
• Demonstrated leadership skills with a proven ability to build trust, gain support, and influence others.
• Demonstrated competency in coaching team members for business results, empowerment of others, leading and managing change, relationship building, and problem solving.
• Results-oriented, self-motivated leader who can work in a team environment, as well as work independently.
• Sound judgment and analytical skills with demonstrated ability to analyze complex problems and develop alternative solutions.
• Ability to plan and forecast sales on an individual and regional level.
• Strong PC skills and proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite.
• Impeccable interpersonal skills appropriate to audience and selling situation.
• Strong negotiation skills with a record of favorable outcomes that are mutually advantageous to Company, supplier, and customer.

Sarnova is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We offer a competitive salary, commensurate with experience, along with a comprehensive benefits package, including 401(k) Plan. EEO/M/F/Veterans/Disabled. Our mission is to be the best partner for those who save and improve patients’ lives. Excellence in delivering upon our mission is dependent upon having a diverse team that is empowered to bring their full, authentic self to work each day. We strive to create a workplace that reflects the communities we serve, and we are passionate about creating an inclusive workplace that promotes and values diversity.
